channel.title: Emulous
channel.description:
-Stop using this picture, if you read the announcements, you wouldn't need it.
[size=8pt]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,335659.0.html[/size] -Kihomura
[b]HERES THE DOWNLOAD LINK[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/189528824/Emulous_1.6.2.rar
okay well im sick n tired of see'ing everyone use delta so i thot ppl shuld see this guys source, its friken incredible and 100% better then delta, i hope u learn to not leech delta... theres 2 many delta servers out there...
ALL CREDITS TO HAYZIE FROM ROON-SIRV!
[QUOTE=hayzie;938947][IMG]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/3457/emulous16lk3.png[/img]
[B]Base: [/B]very basic wL
[B]Working on:[/B] probably special attacks :)
[B]Features:[/B] [CODE] [B]Version 1.6.2:[/B] few updates + improvements bugs fixed with 2 players dieing at the same time in duel arena
[B]Version 1.6.1:[/B] - some bug fixes - can't duel players with no range, melee and magic on as there is no way to attack them.
[B]Version 1.6:[/B] 20/01/09 - DUEL ARENA! 90% i think but in terms of what noobs say about their own arena this is 100%1!1! duel arena tele is in quest tab - circle (armour) rules consider how many spaces u and your opponent have left. With the circle rules once you start the duel the items will be un-wielded and placed in your inventory, you won't be able to wear them though. - other rules like no range, no magic work, fun weapons can be added in config.java file, obstacles teleport u to the different arena. - offering 1, 5, 10, all and X all work - 3 2 1 fight thingy xD - second screen works and tells you about the stake + rules you have - head icon hints work if you use bluurs client - forfeiting works, you can't drop items or attack other players, if you x out your opponent wins the duel. - claiming items, if you don't have enough space the items will be dropped on the ground.
[COLOR="SeaGreen"]Other things:[/COLOR] - items requirements - 2handed weapons + shield fix - friends list, private messaging. - clicking objects or npcs with shops now walks to them and opens them up - change character appearance works, it will load when u start playing. - you can enable bluurs client in the config.java, change the value to a true and the skull icon to a false and it will allow you to use hints and the correct skull.
[B]Version 1.5:[/B] 12/01/09 - Pvp (melee, range, magic) - wildy with single and multi zones work also wildy levels works - nice and simple skull system - items kept on death can be found in quest tab - items dropped and removed when player dies, skull and protect item works etc - reduce magic spells like confuse, curse etc works, and player stays immune for a period of time - attack option when in wildy and remove when out of wild. - teleblock works and you can't teleport above level 20 wild - charge spell temporary increase god spells damage by 10 - stats reduce after time - basic following - few bugs fixed
[B]Version 1.4:[/B] 04/01/09 [B]Version 1.4.1 bug fixes:[/B] - Crystal bow degrading improved to support multiple bows - Casting magic more than once now doesn't move you (opps still bugged a bit) - Weapon switching sped up a little - Few other small improvements -------------- - Extremely good prayer (att, def and str prayers all work, protect from melee(only one needed atm)) - Prayer switching - Prayer drain rates (prayer bonuses and prayer type counts) - Range improvements (knives, darts, javelins, axes, toktz-xil-ul , seercull and crystal bow with degrading) - Teleporting with ancient and normal magic + bug fixed when players can't see each other - Npc and player melee hit delays added - Npc defense against melee, range and magic (needs a bit more tweaking) - Npc max hit, defence and attack level can be edited in the spawn-config.cfg file - Switching weapons changed a bit [B]only when in combat[/B], see animation gif for more info
[B]Version 1.3:[/B] 30/12/08 Npc combat (hit delays, npc dieing emotes, respawn time) Ranging (bow with arrow requirements, dropping arrows, arrows fired from x and y even when running) Normal and Ancient magic (freezing works, healing blood spell work) Npc Drops (very simple to add new npc) Eating food Picking up items improved Dieing Burying bones Most npc update masks Most player update masks
[B]Version 1.2:[/B] 27/12/08 Shops full working 1, 5, 10 - buy and sell items Trading, full working 1, 5, 10, all, x - remove and add items Npc Clicking (shops) Object Clicking (banking)
[B]Version 1.1:[/B] 26/12/08 new packet handling system, thanks graham few improvements
[B]Version 1:[/B] Items leveling, level up interfaces, new refreshskills method
Wielding / un-wielding items Dropping and picking up items Item Bonuses Banking Saving and loading NPCs [/CODE]
[B]Pictures:[/B] [SPOILER="Pictures"]
[B]Whats new in v1.6[/B] [IMG]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/3457/emulous16lk3.png[/img]
[B]Whats new in v1.5[/B] [IMG]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/8175/version15ag4.png[/img]
[B]Whats new in v1.4[/B] [IMG]http://img241.imageshack.us/img241/6568/14updatebz6.png[/img]
[b]new weapon switching in combat delay [COLOR="SeaGreen"]animation gif[/COLOR][b] [URL=http://"http://img530.imageshack.us/img530/3881/emuswitchingweaponsei0.gif"]http://img530.imageshack.us/img530/3881/emuswitchingweaponsei0.gif[/URL]
[B]Npc Combat[/B] [IMG]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/2838/combatdisplayfg7.png[/img]
[B]Trading:[/B] [IMG]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/5995/tradingun1.png[/img] [IMG]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/6756/trading2sn2.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[B]Videos:[/B] [CODE]
[URL="http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=I-QWHgzGIQ0"]Duel Arena[/URL]
[URL="http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=E7uBnoQRYuk"]Wildy small stuff[/URL]
[URL="http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=mna5VESqS1Q"]More Range Weapons[/URL]
[URL="http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=cN3mHBYDJ18"]Prayer[/URL]
[URL="http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=nfk3hptYyy4"]Ancient magic spells[/URL]
[URL="http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=dvOwJLyy7PY"]Npc Combat[/URL]
[URL="http://au.youtube.com/watch?v=dQWqfdklPmY"]Trading[/URL] [/CODE]
[I]note: character files, shops, npc configs and such found in the bin folder You can configure most of the server by editing the config class (add npc drops, magic requires rune etc) [/I]
[B]Download:[/B] [CODE] [URL="http://uppit.com/FYKKNX"]Version 1.6.2[/URL] [URL="http://uppit.com/RU6YXC"]Version 1.6.1[/URL] [URL="http://uppit.com/PPKBAC"]Version 1.6[/URL] [URL="http://uppit.com/BDG6RI"]Version 1.5[/URL] [URL="http://uppit.com/ABGVXE"]Version 1.4.1[/URL] [URL="http://uppit.com/RLN66S"]Version 1.4[/URL] [URL="http://uppit.com/2WZ1IT"]Version 1.3[/URL] [URL="http://uppit.com/V7Z2VC"]Version 1.2[/URL] [URL="http://uppit.com/LGXZUZ"]Version 1.1:[/URL][/CODE]
[B]Client:[/B] [CODE]The client is just bluurs client which can be found here [URL="http://www.google.org/f15/bluurrs-client-t108131.html"]http://www.google.org/f15/bluurrs-client-t108131.html[/URL]
To enable the client to work on the server go to the config.java file on the server and change these values public static final boolean BLUURS_CLIENT = true; // change to true public static final boolean SKULL_HEAD_ICON = false; // change to false [/CODE]
[B]Javadocs:[/B] [URL=http://"http://www.hayzie.com/Emulous/JavaDocs/"]http://www.hayzie.com/Emulous/JavaDocs/[/URL]
enjoy and post bugs so i can fix :p[/QUOTE]
100% CREDITS TO HAYZIE! (former maker of Damnation, dont no wat hapened to it but it looked gr8...)
